bug.author: tawsifsazid
bug.summary: imdb.load_data() is not returning meaningful sentences as I have given print like x_train[0], x_train[1] after loading the data!
bug.description: code example for review (x_train, y_train), (x_test, y_test) = imdb.load_data() word_to_ix = imdb.get_word_index() ix_to_word = dict( (value, key) for key, value in word_to_ix.items() ) for i in range(len(x_train[0])): print(ix_to_word[x_train[0][i]])
